plot: In an autumnal setting, this short film shows an old man for whom the pressures of this era become too much to take, while his wife has gone shopping.
title: Autumn Leaves
plot_es: In an autumnal setting, this short film shows an old man for whom the pressures of this era become too much to take, while his wife has gone shopping.
plot_en: In an autumnal setting, this short film shows an old man for whom the pressures of this era become too much to take, while his wife has gone shopping.
